resources.string: The Sudoku Rules\n\nTo win the game you need to fill in the spaces with numbers such that each row and column has only one number copy from 1-9 inclusive. This means a row/column cannot have for example two 2s or two 5s. The board is divided up into 9 sub-boards. Each sub-board is divided up by thick black lines. Similar to the column/row rule, each sub-board can only have one number copy in it.
